sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import productsData from "src/assets/data/products.json"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { products: any[]; filteredProducts: any[]; properties: string[]; selectedProperties: string[] = []; manufacturers: string[]; selectedManufacturers: string[] = []; constructor() { this.products = productsData; this.filteredProducts = this.products; this.properties = this.getUniqueProperties(); this.manufacturers = this.getUniqueManufacturers(); } filterProducts() { let filteredProducts = this.products; // Filter by properties if (this.selectedProperties.length > 0) { filteredProducts = filteredProducts.filter((product) => { return this.selectedProperties.every((property) => { return product.properties.includes(property); }); }); } // Filter by manufacturers if (this.selectedManufacturers.length > 0) { filteredProducts = filteredProducts.filter((product) => { return this.selectedManufacturers.includes(product.manufacturer); }); } this.filteredProducts = filteredProducts; } getUniqueProperties() { let properties: any[] = []; this.products.forEach((product) => { product.properties.forEach((property: any) => { if (!properties.includes(property)) { properties.push(property); } }); }); return properties; } getUniqueManufacturers() { let manufacturers: any[] = []; this.products.forEach((product) => { if (!manufacturers.includes(product.manufacturer)) { manufacturers.push(product.manufacturer); } }); return manufacturers; } }
